documents.document: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS the refugees are already stringently vetted prior to getting their visas and you know it.

@scott_tobias well the swamp has been refilled now it is time to damage other things.

@deepgreendesign thank you. I think I did it.
@deepgreendesign thank you. I will look.
@deepgreendesign yeah...no. I have a Samsung. It just seems even more important now to proclaim one's citizenship. Thank you anyway!
@deepgreendesign dumb question. How do you get that Canadian flag by your name? I want one and can't figure out how to do it?????
